Supported languages include Spanish, French, Chinese, Russian, Korean, Arabic, and more. response_text: Here are some of the best free AI video translator options you can use right now — varying by what you need (subtitles only vs. dubbing, languages supported, lip‑sync, etc.):  Top free tools  Vozo AI Video Translator – free online tool with AI‑dubbed audio, subtitles, and lip sync in 110+ languages (no signup). Vozo [https://www.vozo.ai/video-translate]  BlipCut AI Video Translator – free online translator with voice cloning, auto subtitles, and lip sync. Video Translator [https://videotranslator.blipcut.com/]  Invideo AI Video Translator – translates video audio and captions into 50+ languages (free tier available). Invideo [https://invideo.io/make/video-translator/]  Happy Scribe – free translation of the first ~10 minutes with auto subtitles in 120+ languages. happyscribe.com [https://www.happyscribe.com/translate-video]  CapCut AI Video Translator – free subtitle translation tool with support for ~27 languages in subtitle form. CapCut [https://www.capcut.com/tools/video-translator/]  Wayin AI Video Translator – free online tool for translating subtitles into 100+ languages. WayinVideo [https://wayin.ai/tools/video-translator/]  Also worth trying (partials/free trials)  Synthesia – free up to a short video with full translation + lip sync. Synthesia [https://www.synthesia.io/features/video-translator]  Maestra.ai – free trial with subtitles/voiceover for many languages. Maestra AI [https://maestra.ai/tools/video-translator]  ScreenPal – free translator with voiceovers & captions in 140+ languages. ScreenPal [https://screenpal.com/tool/ai-video-translator]  Quick picks by need  Best overall free dubbing + subtitles: Vozo AI or BlipCut.  Best for quick subtitle translation only: CapCut or Happy Scribe.  Free trial with pro features: Synthesia, Maestra. Invideo+1 [https://invideo.io/make/video-translator/]  Want a recommendation based on your specific use (e.g., YouTube, Instagram, long videos, or just subtitles)?
